law.catch_line: Death Of Heir, Next Of Kin, Devisee Or Legatee; Effect
law.text: [ Text of section effective until March 31, 2012. Repealed by 2008, 521, Sec. 16. See 2008, 521, Sec. 44 as amended by 2010, 409, Sec. 23 and 2011, 224.] If an heir, next of kin, devisee or legatee dies without having paid his just proportion of such debt, his executor or administrator shall be liable therefor, as for a debt of his decedent, to the extent to which said decedent would have been liable if living.
